channel.title: ICP Eminem Fight -Whoes Side Are You On?
channel.description:
Hey,
I felt like starting a debate, so here we go. Research [url=http://www.trshady.com/eminemenemies/ICP/]here.[/url] Then come back and give who you think is in the right/wrong. I believe Eminem started it, but handled it better.

item.title: ICP Eminem Fight -Whoes Side Are You On?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Eminem is probably one of the biggest rappers of this time, so if he started making it public then all eminems fans would hate whoever Eminem has “beef” with.

Look at Tupac and biggie, when they had their little fight a large population of tupac fans disliked biggie, and a large population of biggies fans disliked tupac.

Read full topic
item.source: ICP Eminem Fight -Whoes Side Are You On?

item.title: ICP Eminem Fight -Whoes Side Are You On?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

All I know is, don’t mess with Eminem, he is too clever and such a good lyricist that you will most likely end up looking stupid, pretty much how ICP look now. They had beef but Eminem just wrote songs they couldn’t compare with, now the beef is over. They used childish insults while Eminem said stuff on his songs that would either embarrass ICP or encourage them to launch another diss track, which helped publicity for Eminem and showed he could really do hardcore lyrics but still make it funny.

Off-topic, I know, but I am starting to dislike his music as time goes on. I liked his old stuff, mostly from The Marshall Mathers LP and The Slim Shady LP, however his new stuff (especially Encore) is shit compared to the music he used to make.

I would go into more detail, maybe find some snippets from his older songs compared to his newer songs, but really, I’m not in the mood.

Read full topic
item.source: ICP Eminem Fight -Whoes Side Are You On?
